<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a24a4582-9bb2-439b-a34e-dd571e4a870c#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Fájdalmas Krisztus töviskoronával</string>
            <string language="en">Painful Christ with crown of thorns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmerzlicher Christ mit Dornenkrone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ douloureux avec la couronne des 
épines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ doloroso com a coroa de espinhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ doloroso con la parte superiore delle 
spine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπονος Χριστός με την κορώνα των αγκαθιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo doloroso con la corona de espinas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Fájdalmas Krisztus töviskoronával - részlet Dürer Nagy Passiósorozatának címlapjáról, 1511</string>
            <string language="en">Painful Christ with crown of thorns - piece from cover page of Dürer's Great Passion-series, 1511</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">dürer fájdalmas krisztus passió,  </string>
            <string language="en">Dürer, painful, Christ, Passion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmerzlicher Christ mit Dornenkrone - bessern Sie
von der Abdeckungseite von Dürers großer Neigung-Serie, 1511 aus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ douloureux avec la couronne des épines
- rapiécez de la page de couverture de la grande Passion-série de 
Dürer, 1511</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ doloroso com a coroa de espinhos - remende 
da página de tampa da Paixão-série grande de Dürer, 1511</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ doloroso con la parte superiore delle 
spine - colleghi dalla pagina di copertina della Passione-serie grande
del Dürer, 1511</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπονος Χριστός με την κορώνα των αγκαθιών - κομμάτι
από τη σελίδα κάλυψης των μεγάλων πάθος-σειρών Dόrer, 
1511</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo doloroso con la corona de espinas - junte 
las piezas de la paginación de cubierta de la gran Pasio'n-serie de 
Dürer, 1511</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dürer, schmerzlich, Christ, Neigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dürer, douloureux, le Christ, passion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dürer, doloroso, Christ, paixão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dürer, doloroso, Christ, passione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dόrer, επίπονο, Χριστός, πάθος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dürer, doloroso, Cristo, pasión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <id>220</id>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
